     #include <iostream>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include<math.h>
    #include<vector>
    #include<string.h>
    using namespace std;
    long long int a[100000],b[100000],c[100000],k;
    char op[1000000];
    int main() {
    int i,j,n,m,t,x,y,ans;
    cin>>op;
    n=strlen(op);
    m=n/2;
    if(n>=3)
    cout<<op[m-1]<<op[m]<<op[m+1]<<endl;
    else
    cout<<"0"<<endl;
    return 0;
    }
